topic.description: LunarCrush social topic. Can only include letters, numbers, spaces, #, and $

title.description: The case-sensitive title of the topic or category

topic_rank.description: LunarCrush metric for ranking a social topic relative to all other social topics

topic_rank_1h_previous.description: The topic rank from 1 hour ago

topic_rank_24h_previous.description: The topic rank from 24 hours ago

num_contributors.description: The number of unique social contributors to the topic

social_dominance.description: The percent of the total social volume that this topic represents

num_posts.description: Total number of posts with interactions on this topic in the last 24 hours

interactions_1h.description: Number of interactions in the last hour

interactions_24h.description: Number of interactions in the last 24 hours
